pizza.name: Tony's Pizza Palace
pizza.description: Family-owned institution known for authentic Neapolitan-style pizza with a perfect thin crust. Their wood-fired oven creates a distinctive char on their handcrafted dough.

pizza.name: Rosso Pizzeria
pizza.description: Artisanal pizzeria featuring locally-sourced ingredients and creative topping combinations. Their sourdough crust has a delicious tang that complements their house-made sauce.

pizza.name: Sepps Pizza
pizza.description: Local favorite serving Chicago-style deep dish pizza with generous toppings and a flaky, buttery crust. Known for their massive portion sizes and family-friendly atmosphere.

pizza.name: Ragazzi Pizza Co.
pizza.description: Modern pizzeria offering both traditional and innovative pies. Their New York-style slices are perfect for folding, with the ideal balance of thin crust and quality toppings.

pizza.name: Love Pizza
pizza.description: Contemporary quick-service pizza spot with build-your-own options and creative seasonal specials. Their commitment to community involvement makes them a neighborhood staple.

coffee.name: Transcend Coffee
coffee.description: Specialty coffee roaster focusing on direct trade relationships with farmers. Known for their meticulous brewing methods and educational cupping sessions.

coffee.name: The Columbian Coffee House
coffee.description: Cozy neighborhood café serving single-origin coffees and house-made pastries. Their comfortable atmosphere makes it perfect for both working and socializing.

coffee.name: ACE Coffee Roasters
coffee.description: Hip micro-roastery with an industrial-chic café space. Their knowledgeable baristas create perfect espresso drinks using their own freshly roasted beans.

coffee.name: Little Brick Cafe
coffee.description: Charming café housed in a historic brick home with a beautiful garden patio. Their commitment to quality coffee is matched by their outstanding breakfast and lunch menu.

coffee.name: Remedy Cafe
coffee.description: Eclectic café offering a fusion of Indian and Western foods alongside specialty coffee and chai. Their vibrant atmosphere and late hours make it a community gathering spot.

gyms.name: Evolve Strength
gyms.description: Modern fitness facility with top-of-the-line equipment and specialized training zones. Their knowledgeable staff and spacious layout create an ideal environment for serious training.

gyms.name: SVPT Fitness & Athletics
gyms.description: Boutique training studio offering personalized coaching and small group fitness classes. Their science-based approach and attention to form sets them apart from standard gyms.

gyms.name: Fit4Less
gyms.description: Budget-friendly gym with 24/7 access and a comprehensive selection of cardio and strength equipment. Perfect for self-directed exercisers who want affordability without sacrificing quality.

gyms.name: Blitz Conditioning
gyms.description: High-energy fitness studio specializing in circuit training and HIIT workouts. Their motivating instructors and community atmosphere keep members coming back.

gyms.name: The Meadows Recreation Centre
gyms.description: Multi-purpose city facility offering a well-equipped fitness center alongside swimming pools and ice rinks. Their affordable membership includes access to multiple city recreation centers.

neighborhoods.name: Strathcona
neighborhoods.description: Historic district with beautiful character homes, tree-lined streets, and the popular Whyte Avenue shopping and dining area. Known for its vibrant arts scene and walkability.

neighborhoods.name: Glenora
neighborhoods.description: Prestigious central neighborhood featuring mature trees, historical mansions, and proximity to the river valley. Its quiet streets and excellent schools make it ideal for families.

neighborhoods.name: Ritchie
neighborhoods.description: Up-and-coming area with a mix of original character homes and modern infills. Its growing restaurant scene and community spirit have made it increasingly popular with young professionals.

neighborhoods.name: Oliver
neighborhoods.description: Dense, urban neighborhood west of downtown with a mix of high-rises and historic buildings. Its central location and abundant amenities appeal to students and young urban professionals.

neighborhoods.name: Highlands
neighborhoods.description: Character neighborhood in northeast Edmonton known for its Arts and Crafts style homes and community engagement. Its affordability relative to other character areas makes it attractive to families.

festivals.name: Edmonton Folk Music Festival
festivals.description: Beloved summer festival in Gallagher Park featuring local and international folk artists. Known for its relaxed atmosphere and stunning river valley views.

festivals.name: K-Days
festivals.description: Annual summer exhibition with midway rides, concerts, food, and exhibitions. A longstanding Edmonton tradition that attracts visitors of all ages.

festivals.name: Taste of Edmonton
festivals.description: Food festival showcasing the diverse culinary scene of Edmonton. Features samples from dozens of local restaurants and food trucks.

festivals.name: Edmonton International Fringe Theatre Festival
festivals.description: North America's largest fringe festival, featuring hundreds of independent theater performances throughout Old Strathcona.

festivals.name: Heritage Festival
festivals.description: Celebration of Edmonton's cultural diversity, with pavilions representing over 100 countries. Features traditional food, dance, and crafts from around the world.
